dc_description_s: This point shapefile depicts a collection of various scuba diving sites along the California coast compiled for planning purposes in accordance with the Marine Life Protection Act (MPLA). Sources include PISCO, REEF, www.wannadive.net and www.scubadiving.com.This coverage provides cartographic representation of SCUBA diving sites on the California coast.
dc_publisher_s: California. Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region
dc_creator_sm: California. Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region
